v8:item.v8:content: Certificates are not available on client
Certificates not available on client icon
Certificates not available on the server icon
To display certificates, authorize on the DSS server
Ignore filters and show all certificates.
How to use digital signature and encryption apps

Unique certificate presentation is used in selection fields on signing and encrypting. It consists of last name, name, company, position, and validity term. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017".
In case a user has two certificates issued by different certificate authorities (CA), the CA name is added to the certificate presentation. For example: "Anthony Smith, 1C LLC, Developer, until 03/2017, 1C CA".
In case a certificate is used by multiple users for a certain purpose, the purpose description is used instead of the certificate presentation, for example: "For tax invoice signing, until 05/2019", "For tax reporting signing, until 12/2015".
Tooltip text is set from a catalog attribute.
Tooltip text is set from a catalog attribute.
Protect digital signing app with password
Protect digital signing app with password
Enter the password of certificate private key to check the key before certificate selection.
Remember the certificate password before closing the app. When the check box is cleared, the stored password will be forgotten.
Click Select to start entering password.
